game.name: Their Sky
game.shortDescription: Their Sky is an idle deck-builder. Select cards and strategies as you build decks that can win on their own. Rather than managing moves, Their Sky all in on deck building: turn your favorite cards into self-running engines.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Their Sky is an idle deck-builder. Select cards and strategies as you build decks that can win on their own. Rather than managing moves, Their Sky all in on deck building: turn your favorite cards into self-running engines.
